snippet: The Richmond Circuit Court appointed a gay Richmond prosecutor to a General District Court judgeship on Thursday, a month after legislators blocked the appointment.
abstract: Richmond Circuit Court appoints prosecutor Tracy Thorne-Begland, who is gay, to a General District Court judgeship, one month after legislators blocked the appointment; gay rights advocates have said that Thorne-Begland would be Virginia's first openly gay jurist.
lead_paragraph: The Richmond Circuit Court appointed a gay Richmond prosecutor to a General District Court judgeship on Thursday, a month after legislators blocked the appointment.

headline.main: Virginia: Court Appoints Gay Judge to Interim Post
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Court Appoints Gay Judge To Interim Post
